flawed_nl_solution:

If takes 5 hours to go from bottom to top because 30 / 60 = <<30/60=5>>5
The lake is 50 miles from bottom to top because 10 x 5 = <<10*5=50>>50
The square mileage is 1000 because 20 x 50 = <<20*50=1000>>1000
